_meanings:
{@--1@} A
kind of mystical mark on persons
or things denoting good luck.

{@--4@} The crossing of
the arms, making a sign like the
cross;  
{#stanavinihitahastasvastikABirvaDUBiH#} <ls>Māl. 4. 10</ls>; <ls>Śi. 10. 43.</ls>

{@--5@} A
palace of a particular form.

{@--6@} A
particular symbol made with
ground rice and shaped like a 
triangle.

{@--1@} A mansion or temple
of a particular form with a terrace
in front.

{@--2@} A particular mode of
sitting practised by {%Yogins%}.
